channel.title: NCEI Geospatial Products and Services News Feed
channel.description: The latest news on NCEI's geospatial products and services

item.title: issues with WMS access to the Undersea Features map service
item.description: There have been reports that requests to the undersea_features map services have been timing out. We are investigating the problem and will post an update here when available
item.dc:creator: john.c.cartwright
